statements: SELECT * FROM meta_tags WHERE id = 1;
SELECT page_url, description FROM meta_tags WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY page_url ASC;
SELECT id, meta_tags->>'title' AS title FROM meta_tags WHERE LENGTH(description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM meta_tags WHERE description LIKE '%important%' LIMIT 3 OFFSET 2;
SELECT id, page_url FROM meta_tags WHERE meta_tags @> '{"keywords": ["database", "schema"]}';
SELECT * FROM meta_tags WHERE id = 1;
SELECT page_url, meta_tags->'author' AS author FROM meta_tags WHERE meta_tags->'author' = 'John Doe';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_pages FROM meta_tags;
SELECT * FROM meta_tags WHERE page_url LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT id, page_url, description FROM meta_tags ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM meta_tags
SELECT page_id, tag_name FROM meta_tags ORDER BY tag_name DESC
SELECT page_url FROM page_descriptions WHERE page_id = 1
SELECT description FROM page_descriptions WHERE page_id = 2
SELECT page_id, tag_content FROM meta_tags ORDER BY page_id ASC
SELECT * FROM meta_tags WHERE page_id = 1;
SELECT tag_name, tag_content FROM meta_tags WHERE tag_name LIKE 'SEO%';
SELECT page_url, description FROM page_descriptions WHERE page_url = 'https://example.com';
SELECT tag_name, tag_content FROM meta_tags ORDER BY tag_name ASC;
SELECT page_id, description FROM page_descriptions ORDER BY page_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM MetaTags;
SELECT meta_title, meta_description FROM MetaTags WHERE page_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PageDescriptions ORDER BY page_title DESC;
SELECT page_title, full_description FROM PageDescriptions WHERE full_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT page_id, meta_id FROM PageMetaMap WHERE page_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM MetaTags WHERE meta_title LIKE '%example%'
SELECT page_title, full_description FROM PageDescriptions WHERE page_title = 'Home'
SELECT * FROM MetaTags WHERE meta_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY page_id DESC
SELECT page_title, meta_title FROM PageDescriptions INNER JOIN MetaTags ON PageDescriptions.page_id = MetaTags.page_id
SELECT page_title, meta_title, meta_description FROM PageDescriptions INNER JOIN MetaTags ON PageDescriptions.page_id = MetaTags.page_id WHERE meta_title = 'Example'
SELECT * FROM meta_tags;
SELECT page_id, meta_keywords FROM meta_tags ORDER BY page_id DESC;
SELECT page_url, title FROM page_info WHERE page_id = 5;
SELECT page_id, tag_name FROM page_tags WHERE tag_name LIKE 's%';
SELECT page_info.title, meta_tags.meta_keywords FROM page_info INNER JOIN meta_tags ON page_info.page_id = meta_tags.page_id;
SELECT * FROM meta_tags WHERE page_id = 1;
SELECT page_url, title FROM page_info WHERE page_url = 'example.com';
SELECT meta_keywords, COUNT(*) FROM meta_tags GROUP BY meta_keywords ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT tag_name FROM page_tags WHERE tag_id IN (SELECT tag_id FROM page_meta WHERE page_id = 1);
SELECT * FROM page_info JOIN meta_tags ON page_info.page_id = meta_tags.page_id;
SELECT * FROM meta_tags LIMIT 5;
SELECT page_url, title, keywords FROM meta_tags WHERE title = 'Homepage';
SELECT page_url, author, last_modified FROM page_descriptions WHERE author = 'John Doe' ORDER BY last_modified DESC;
SELECT id, page_url, external_url FROM page_links WHERE external_url LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT * FROM page_categories WHERE category_name IN ('Technology', 'Science', 'Art');
SELECT * FROM meta_tags WHERE page_url = 'https://www.example.com'
SELECT title, keywords FROM meta_tags WHERE page_url = 'https://www.example.com'
SELECT content FROM page_descriptions WHERE author = 'John Doe' ORDER BY last_modified DESC
SELECT page_url, external_url FROM page_links WHERE page_url = 'https://www.example.com'
SELECT meta_tags.title, page_links.external_url FROM meta_tags JOIN page_links ON meta_tags.page_url = page_links.page_url
